name: Driving Simulator: Car Games
description:
This new car simulator driving game is here to entertain you with some different features and amazing city environment with sports car driving experience.
Get into the sports car and drive around the city and fulfill different challenges, like you have to go to destination on time and you will be picking the check points. Avoid accidents and don’t crash your modern car.
Be a pro driver in the city and do your duty as a sports car drive through the city. You will face the challenges of traffic, Ai cars and pedestrian and crowed in the city streets. Show your driving skill and have a safe drive.
Features:
- Extreme City Car Driving.
- Ultimate Pro Driver Experience.
- Traffic all-around the city.
- Modern Luxury Cars.
- Many Sports Cars to drive.
- Huge City Roads to derive on.
- Extreme HD Graphics.
- Feasible Ui.
- Free to play.
Drive in the city and Enjoy!
